title: How Prayer Can Help You Set Boundaries with Adult Children
itunes:author: Guest: Erin Lynum
itunes:summary: If your child recently moved out of the house or got married, you may be trying to navigate this new season of your relationship. John and Danny discuss ways to set healthy boundaries with your adult child. Receive the book Praying the Scriptures for Your Adult Children with your gift of any amount!
